Secrets vs Excellence Resorts: Which is Right for You?

A Head-to-Head Comparison of Mexico's Most Popular Adults-Only Chains

Last updated: January 2025

Secrets and Excellence are the two giants of Mexican adults-only all-inclusives. Both deliver reliable luxury, excellent food, and romantic atmospheres—but they're not interchangeable. After hundreds of guest reviews and our own visits, clear differences emerge. One emphasizes polished consistency; the other prioritizes location and suite quality. This guide breaks down everything you need to choose the right one for your trip.

In This Guide

  • The Quick Verdict
  • Brand Overview
  • Accommodations Compared
  • Dining Comparison
  • Beach & Pools
  • Service & Atmosphere
  • Value Analysis
  • Property-by-Property Guide
  • Making Your Decision
  • Booking Tips

The Quick Verdict

{<strong>TL;DR: Choose Based on Your Priority</strong></p><p><strong>Choose Secrets if:</strong></p><ul><li>You want consistent, reliable quality</p><ul><li>Social pool scenes appeal to you</p><ul><li>You prefer larger properties with more dining options</p><ul><li>Brand recognition and loyalty programs matter</p><ul><li>You like the Unlimited-Luxury formula</p><p><strong>Choose Excellence if:</strong></p><ul><li>Suite quality is your top priority</p><ul><li>You want the best beach locations</p><ul><li>You prefer slightly smaller, more intimate properties</p><ul><li>Better in-room dining matters to you</p><ul><li>You value rooftop bars and unique spaces</p><p><strong>Price Comparison:</strong></p><ul><li>Secrets: $600-1,200/night (standard to Preferred Club)</p><ul><li>Excellence: $700-1,400/night (standard to Excellence Club)</p><ul><li>Excellence typically runs 10-15% higher for comparable rooms}

Brand Overview

{<strong>Secrets (AMResorts)</strong></p><p>Part of the massive AMResorts family (Hyatt), Secrets has grown rapidly with multiple properties across Mexico and the Caribbean.</p><p><strong>Mexico Properties:</strong></p><ul><li>Secrets Maroma Beach</p><ul><li>Secrets The Vine Cancún</p><ul><li>Secrets Moxché Playa del Carmen</p><ul><li>Secrets Riviera Cancún</p><ul><li>Secrets Huatulco</p><ul><li>Secrets Puerto Los Cabos</p><ul><li>Secrets Playa Mujeres</p><p><strong>The Philosophy:</strong> Unlimited-Luxury® means premium spirits, 24/7 room service, and no wristbands. Properties run 350-650 suites—big enough for multiple dining venues, but less intimate.</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Excellence (Excellence Group)</strong></p><p>Independently owned Mexican company with fewer properties but intense focus on each location.</p><p><strong>Mexico Properties:</strong></p><ul><li>Excellence Playa Mujeres</p><ul><li>Excellence Riviera Cancún</p><ul><li>Excellence Oyster Bay (opening 2025)</p><p><strong>The Philosophy:</strong> Fewer properties, more attention. Each Excellence resort is meticulously planned with exceptional beaches and suite designs. They choose locations first, then build resorts around them.}

Accommodations Compared

{<strong>Room Quality: Excellence Wins</strong></p><p><strong>Secrets Suites:</strong></p><ul><li>500-650 sq ft average</p><ul><li>Consistent, modern design</p><ul><li>Jetted tubs standard</p><ul><li>Good balconies</p><ul><li>Reliable but not exceptional</p><ul><li>Some properties feel dated</p><p><strong>Excellence Suites:</strong></p><ul><li>600-850 sq ft average</p><ul><li>Elevated design aesthetic</p><ul><li>Larger bathrooms</p><ul><li>Better rooftop terraces</p><ul><li>Swim-out suites are exceptional</p><ul><li>Newer feeling overall</p><p><strong>Swim-Out Suites:</strong></p><ul><li>Both offer swim-outs</p><ul><li>Excellence swim-outs are more private</p><ul><li>Secrets swim-outs often face each other</p><ul><li>Excellence: Better pool design, more seclusion</p><p><strong>The Excellence Club vs Preferred Club:</strong></p><p>| Feature | Excellence Club | Preferred Club | |---------|-----------------|----------------| | Suite upgrade | Rooftop terrace standard | Better location | | Private pool | Yes | Yes | | Lounge access | Premium lounge | PC lounge | | Dining priority | Dedicated restaurant | Priority reservations | | Beach access | Private section | Private section |</p><p><strong>Winner: Excellence</strong> for suite design and space; Secrets for consistency across properties.}

Dining Comparison

{<strong>Restaurant Quality: Tie (Different Strengths)</strong></p><p><strong>Secrets Dining:</strong></p><ul><li>6-10 restaurants per property</p><ul><li>More variety (French, Asian, Italian, Mexican, Seafood)</p><ul><li>Quality varies by property</p><ul><li>Buffet is solid but typical</p><ul><li>Room service: 24 hours, full menu</p><ul><li>Premium wines: Extra cost</p><p><strong>Excellence Dining:</strong></p><ul><li>8-12 restaurants per property</p><ul><li>Higher culinary ambition</p><ul><li>Lobster House is outstanding</p><ul><li>Better quality control</p><ul><li>Room service: Excellent</p><ul><li>Some premium wines included</p><p><strong>Standout Restaurants:</strong></p><p><strong>At Secrets:</strong></p><ul><li>Seaside Grill (Maroma) - oceanfront seafood</p><ul><li>Bordeaux (French) - most elegant option</p><ul><li>Himitsu - teppanyaki experience</p><p><strong>At Excellence:</strong></p><ul><li>Lobster House - the chain's signature</p><ul><li>Chez Isabelle - French fine dining</p><ul><li>Spice - Asian fusion standout</p><p><strong>Breakfast:</strong></p><ul><li>Secrets: Reliable buffet, à la carte available</p><ul><li>Excellence: Better buffet quality, eggs Benedict station is famous</p><p><strong>The Verdict:</strong> Excellence edges ahead on culinary ambition and signature restaurants. Secrets offers more variety and consistency across properties.}

Beach & Pools

{<strong>Beach Quality: Excellence Wins</strong></p><p>Excellence chooses locations specifically for beach quality. Secrets sometimes compromises location for access to nearby attractions.</p><p><strong>Best Beaches:</strong></p><p><strong>Excellence Playa Mujeres:</strong></p><ul><li>Protected bay with calm water</p><ul><li>Less seaweed than most Caribbean beaches</p><ul><li>Powdery white sand</p><ul><li>Arguably the best beach of any Mexican all-inclusive</p><p><strong>Secrets Maroma:</strong></p><ul><li>Famous Maroma Beach</p><ul><li>Protected cove</p><ul><li>Excellent but gets crowded</p><ul><li>Only Secrets property with truly exceptional beach</p><p><strong>Pool Comparison:</strong></p><p><strong>Secrets:</strong></p><ul><li>Large main pools</p><ul><li>Active atmosphere</p><ul><li>Good swim-up bars</p><ul><li>Can feel crowded</p><p><strong>Excellence:</strong></p><ul><li>Multiple pool areas</p><ul><li>Better spread across property</p><ul><li>Rooftop pools at Excellence Club</p><ul><li>More lounge availability</p><p><strong>Winner: Excellence</strong> for overall beach/pool experience. Exception: Secrets Maroma's specific beach rivals anything.}

Service & Atmosphere

{<strong>Service Comparison:</strong></p><p><strong>Secrets Service:</strong></p><ul><li>Professional and consistent</p><ul><li>AMResorts training shows</p><ul><li>Can feel slightly corporate</p><ul><li>Good but not exceptional</p><ul><li>Tips not expected (but appreciated)</p><p><strong>Excellence Service:</strong></p><ul><li>Warmer, more personalized</p><ul><li>Staff-to-guest ratio often better</p><ul><li>More memorable interactions</p><ul><li>Butler service more attentive</p><ul><li>Tips also not required</p><p><strong>Atmosphere:</strong></p><p><strong>Secrets Vibe:</strong></p><ul><li>Larger, more social</p><ul><li>Pool scene is livelier</p><ul><li>More activity throughout day</p><ul><li>Attracts slightly younger couples</p><ul><li>Good for those who like options</p><p><strong>Excellence Vibe:</strong></p><ul><li>More refined, quieter</p><ul><li>Sophisticated atmosphere</p><ul><li>Attracts slightly older demographic</p><ul><li>Less party, more relaxation</p><ul><li>Appeals to luxury seekers</p><p><strong>Demographics:</strong></p><ul><li>Secrets: 30-50s, mix of honeymooners and established couples</p><ul><li>Excellence: 35-60s, more seasoned travelers, honeymooners seeking intimacy}

Value Analysis

{<strong>Price Comparison:</strong></p><p>| Property | Low Season | High Season | Peak | |----------|------------|-------------|------| | Secrets Maroma | $650/night | $900 | $1,200 | | Secrets Riviera Cancún | $550 | $750 | $1,000 | | Excellence Playa Mujeres | $750 | $1,000 | $1,400 | | Excellence Riviera Cancún | $700 | $950 | $1,300 |</p><p><strong>What You Get for the Money:</strong></p><p><strong>Secrets ($600-800/night):</strong></p><ul><li>Reliable adults-only experience</p><ul><li>Good restaurants</p><ul><li>Decent rooms</p><ul><li>Strong beverage program</p><ul><li>Lots of activities</p><p><strong>Excellence ($750-1,000/night):</strong></p><ul><li>Better suites</p><ul><li>Superior beaches</p><ul><li>Elevated dining</p><ul><li>More intimate feel</p><ul><li>Better rooftop experiences</p><p><strong>Value Verdict:</strong></p><ul><li>Secrets: Better value if you prioritize price</p><ul><li>Excellence: Better value if suite quality and beach matter most</p><ul><li>Both are fairly priced for what they offer}

Property-by-Property Guide

{<strong>Secrets Properties Ranked:</strong></p><p><strong>1. Secrets Maroma Beach</strong> ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ The beach makes it. Best Secrets property in Mexico.</p><ul><li>Price: $700-1,200/night</p><ul><li>Best for: Beach lovers, honeymooners</p><p><strong>2. Secrets Moxché</strong> ⭐⭐⭐⭐½ Newest Secrets, modern design, great service.</p><ul><li>Price: $650-1,100/night</p><ul><li>Best for: Those wanting newest property</p><p><strong>3. Secrets The Vine</strong> ⭐⭐⭐⭐ Cancún Hotel Zone location, walkable, wine-focused.</p><ul><li>Price: $600-1,000/night</p><ul><li>Best for: Those wanting off-property access</p><p><strong>4. Secrets Playa Mujeres</strong> ⭐⭐⭐⭐ Quieter location, good beach, golf access.</p><ul><li>Price: $600-1,000/night</p><ul><li>Best for: Golfers, quieter seekers</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Excellence Properties Ranked:</strong></p><p><strong>1. Excellence Playa Mujeres</strong> ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Their flagship. Exceptional beach, outstanding suites.</p><ul><li>Price: $750-1,400/night</p><ul><li>Best for: Those wanting the best overall</p><p><strong>2. Excellence Riviera Cancún</strong> ⭐⭐⭐⭐½ Great beach, slightly smaller, excellent value.</p><ul><li>Price: $700-1,200/night</p><ul><li>Best for: Excellence experience at lower price}

Making Your Decision

{<strong>Choose Secrets If:</strong></p><p>✅ Budget is a primary concern ✅ You want more restaurant variety ✅ You prefer larger, more social resorts ✅ Loyalty programs matter (AMResorts/Hyatt) ✅ You're booking Maroma specifically (beach is exceptional) ✅ You want Cancún Hotel Zone access (The Vine)</p><p><strong>Choose Excellence If:</strong></p><p>✅ Suite quality is paramount ✅ Beach quality is your top priority ✅ You prefer a more refined atmosphere ✅ Rooftop experiences appeal to you ✅ You're celebrating a major occasion ✅ You want the Lobster House experience</p><p><strong>For Honeymooners:</strong></p><ul><li>Excellence Playa Mujeres or Secrets Maroma</p><ul><li>Both deliver romance; Excellence is more intimate</p><p><strong>For Anniversaries:</strong></p><ul><li>Excellence Club upgrade is worth it</p><ul><li>Secrets Preferred Club at Maroma also excellent</p><p><strong>For First-Time All-Inclusive:</strong></p><ul><li>Secrets is more forgiving if you don't know what you want</p><ul><li>Excellence is better if you've researched your preferences}

Booking Tips

{<strong>How to Book Secrets:</strong></p><p>1. <strong>Costco Travel</strong> - Often best packages</p><ol><li><strong>AMResorts direct</strong> - Watch for flash sales</p><ol><li><strong>Hyatt points</strong> - If you have them</p><ol><li><strong>Travel agents</strong> - Good for honeymoon perks</p><p><strong>How to Book Excellence:</strong></p><p>1. <strong>Excellence direct</strong> - Loyalty program benefits</p><ol><li><strong>Costco Travel</strong> - Competitive packages</p><ol><li><strong>Travel agents</strong> - Often have extras</p><ol><li><strong>Avoid OTAs</strong> - Usually no better deals</p><p><strong>When to Book:</strong></p><ul><li>2-4 months ahead: Best rates</p><ul><li>Excellence: Books up faster—reserve earlier</p><ul><li>Secrets: More availability, more flexibility</p><p><strong>Best Value Timing:</strong></p><ul><li>May-June: 30-40% off peak rates</p><ul><li>September-October: Hurricane season but best prices</p><ul><li>November: Sweet spot of weather and price</p><ul><li>Avoid: Christmas/New Year (expensive, crowded)</p><p><strong>Upgrade Tips:</strong></p><ul><li>Excellence Club: Worth it for special occasions</p><ul><li>Preferred Club: Worth it at Maroma for beach beds</p><ul><li>Both: Book base room, request upgrade at check-in}

Frequently Asked Questions

Which is better for honeymoons—Secrets or Excellence?

Both excel at honeymoons, but Excellence edges ahead for couples wanting intimacy and romance. Excellence Playa Mujeres has better suites and a more refined atmosphere. However, Secrets Maroma's beach is unmatched—if beach quality is your priority, it's a strong choice. Both include honeymoon perks; Excellence's tend to be slightly better.

Is Excellence worth the extra cost over Secrets?

If suite quality and beach experience are priorities, yes. You'll pay 10-15% more for noticeably better accommodations and typically superior beach locations. If you're primarily interested in dining variety and social atmosphere, Secrets offers excellent value and the savings can fund spa treatments or excursions.

Can you walk off property at these resorts?

Only Secrets The Vine (Cancún Hotel Zone) has meaningful walkable surroundings. All other Secrets and Excellence properties are self-contained—you're committing to the resort experience. This isn't a negative; it's by design. Both chains create comprehensive experiences that don't require leaving.

Which has better food—Secrets or Excellence?

Excellence has higher culinary ambitions, particularly at their signature Lobster House. Secrets offers more variety with more restaurants per property. For most guests, both deliver satisfying all-inclusive dining. Foodies lean toward Excellence; those wanting options prefer Secrets.

Are these resorts crowded?

Secrets properties are larger (400-600 suites) and feel more active. Excellence properties (450-500 suites) better distribute guests across multiple areas. Neither feels cramped, but Excellence generally has better lounge and pool availability. Peak season (Christmas, Spring Break) challenges both.
